Maud and Ivy

PERSONALISED SERVICE

Premium Flowers

Taking
thoughtful
to the next level.

Hello, my name is Monique Rameau, owner of Maud and Ivy Flowers. I am a unique retail and event florist with devotion to detail that doesn't disappoint. My clients come to me because they trust I will create something special to share with the important people in their lives. My focus is on personalising every order and exploring all textures to perfectly convey your thoughts and themes. My customers feel confident with my process and return time and time again. Go ahead and make a no obligation enquiry or browse my beautiful gallery of work.

GC Breeze Radio

Wow is exactly what I said, more than once when she (Monique) dropped her flowers to me. When I saw the flowers she created I was absolutely blown away. These would be gorgeous as a corporate gift, even just one of those just-because gifts. These flowers lived on my desk for weeks...

Michael from The Mop King

A big thankyou to Monique who I think is the number one boutique flower business on the Gold Coast. She's gone far and beyond what I need. My mum's the world and I want to say thankyou.
